TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of unit that is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property to specify the units of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit Item = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is measured in terms of the items that are displayed in the panel.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit Page = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is measured in terms of a page, which is equal to the size of the panel's viewport.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit Pixel = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is measured in terms of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
